DOC.brief_title: Study Comparing Outcomes Between Conventional IVF `` Freeze-all '' -Strategy Assisted Reproductive Technology
DOC.detailed_description: The study multicentre randomize control double-blinded trial purpose investigate pregnancy- live birth rate improve `` freeze transfer later '' -strategy transfer best quality , frozen , thaw embryo subsequent natural cycle compare conventional fresh embryo transfer transfer embryo stimulate cycle . In total 5 clinic Denmark Sweden participate recruitment patient study . The patient screen randomized computerized cycle day 2 3 allocate one two study arm : I : hCG ( human chorion gonadotrophin ) arm traditional hCG trigger fresh blastocyst transfer II : GnRH ( gonadotropin-releasing hormone ) - agonist trigger arm blastocyst cryopreservation subsequent transfer subsequent natural cycle . The randomization do decision gonadotrophin ( rFSH/hMG ) start dose , doctor patient blind randomization day hCG/agonist trigger . Both group stimulate short GnRH antagonist protocol . The ovarian stimulation The gonadotrophin stimulation perform accord general standard clinic alter accord ovarian response maximum 300 IU . Blood sample collect baseline first gonadotrophin injection day hCG injection blood sample luteal phase collect small subgroup patient . All blood sample keep Biobank study Hvidovre Hospital . Women arm furthermore request fill physical discomfort quality life questionnaire two different visit . Additionally men ask fill quality life questionnaire . Comprehensive sonography perform start ovulation detail ovary . Ultrasound examination perform cycle day 2-3 , stimulation day 6 thereafter every 2-3 day ovulation induct . On day oocyte retrieval randomization unblinded . The oocyte fertilize either IVF ICSI culture individually accord normal procedure clinic . If patient allocate `` Fresh embryo transfer '' -group best quality blastocyst transfer day five oocyte pick-up , blastocyst develop . Surplus good quality blastocyst vitrify day five six . For patient `` Freeze '' group embryos good quality vitrify blastocyst stage day 5 stimulate cycle accord criterion freeze blastocyst clinic . The high quality embryo select mark first one thaw least one mentrual cycle consider wash period . Embryo transfer perform 6-7 day hCG injection blastocyst transfer cycle group . A serum beta-hCG test perform 11 day blastocyst transfer , clinical pregnancy confirm transvaginal ultrasound 3 4 week positive serum-hCG test . A follow-up pregnancy perform within three month delivery termination pregnancy predefined information sheet . All pregnancy result blastocyst retrieve thawed accord study protocol follow study inclusion one year onwards . All data collect single database participant anonymized way identificationcode . The biobank close sample destroy 5 year conclusion study late . The study superiority study 424 ( 212 arm ) patient require 80 % chance detecting , significant 5 % level , decrease primary outcome measure 30 % control group 43 % experimental group .
